text: Josef Haas (3 August 1937 â€“ 18 January 2024) was a Swiss cross-country skier. He competed in the late 1960s. He won the 50 km bronze at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble. Haas was the first Swiss to earn a cross-country skiing Olympic medal. Haas died on 18 January 2024 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Switzerland Category:Swiss skiers Category:Sportspeople from the canton of Lucerne
title: Josef Haas
